subject: Basketball
College Athletics
NCAA Basketball Tournament
lead_paragraph: The N.C.A.A. tournament is Indiana’s last chance to make the 2007-8 season more than a miserable memory for a team that held so much promise a month ago.
snippet: The N.C.A.A. tournament is Indiana’s last chance to make the 2007-8 season more than a miserable memory for a team that held so much promise a month ago.
